last_episode_to_air.name: The Mystery of the Amber Beads
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hagar the Gypsy sets out to prove that Detective Sergeat Grubber is wrong about who killed Mrs Arryford.

name: The Rivals of Sherlock Holmes
overview: Adaptations of mystery stories written by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's contemporary rivals in the genre.

episodes.name: A Message from the Deep Sea
episodes.overview:
This episode features Dr Thorndyke, played by John Neville, who is first a medical man and second a solver of mysteries. A young girl has been murdered in her boarding house and the solution looks obvious - but is it?

Neville plays the sleuth with aplomb and this is a strong opening episode. The character is arrogant, capable, and likable - and of course his intelligence makes his police colleagues and/or adversaries look like idiots!

episodes.name: The Missing Witness Sensation
episodes.overview: Max Carrados, the blind detective, solves the case of a bank teller shot at his counter.

episodes.name: The Affair of the Avalanche Bicycle and Tire Co.
episodes.overview: Horace Dorrington solves the mystery of a case of sabotage on a bicycle track.

episodes.name: The Duchess of Wiltshire's Diamonds
episodes.overview: Simon Carne devises an ingenious way of keeping the Duchess of Wiltshire's diamonds safe from theft.

episodes.name: The Horse of the Invisible
episodes.overview: Carnacki solves the case of an invisible horse that is haunting a family of the eve of a wedding.

episodes.name: The Case of the Mirror of Portugal
episodes.overview: Horace Dorrington clears up the mystery of the theft of a valuable diamond.

episodes.name: Madame Sara
episodes.overview: Dixon Duce helps solve a murder case.

episodes.name: The Case of the Dixon Torpedo
episodes.overview: Jonathan Pride gets involved in a case involving a secret weapon, an eccentric inventor and forged roubles.

episodes.name: The Woman in the Big Hat
episodes.overview: Lady Molly of Scotland Yard solves the murdeer of a respectable man.

episodes.name: The Affair of the Tortoise
episodes.overview: Arhtur Hewitt gets mixed up in a case involving voodoo and the disappearance of a dead body.

episodes.name: The Assyrian Rejuvenator
episodes.overview: Conman and invesigator Romney Pringkle exposes a swindle and makes a profit.

episodes.name: The Ripening Rubies
episodes.overview: Bernard Sutton is called in to help stop a series of jewel robberies.

episodes.name: The Case of Laker, Absconded
episodes.overview: Arthur Hewitt and Jonathan Pride band together to find a bank clerk who has disappeared with £ 15,000.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Death on the Underground Railway
episodes.overview: Polly Burton assists in soving the case of a grl found dead on a seat of an underground train.

episodes.name: Five Hundred Carats
episodes.overview: Inspecor Lipinski investigates the theft of a 500 carat diamond.

episodes.name: Cell 13
episodes.overview: Professor Van Dusen, the 'Thinking Machine', boasts that he can think his way out of a prison cell. When he is locked up he is given the chance to prove that he can escape by the power of his mind alone.

episodes.name: The Secret of the Manifique
episodes.overview: Laxworthy and two friends secure the safety of the plans for the first torpedo to be used by the French navy.

episodes.name: The Absent-Minded Coterie
episodes.overview: Valmont has to help break a ring of counterfeiters.

episodes.name: The Sensible Action of Lieutenant Hoist
episodes.overview: Lieutenant Holst of Copenhagen has to help a Russian countess who claims her brother-in-law aims to kill her.

episodes.name: The Superfluous Finger
episodes.overview: Professor Van Dusen must find out why a young woman had a perfectly healthy finger cut off by the eminent surgeon Prescott.

episodes.name: Anonymous Letters
episodes.overview: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, Dagobert Trostler investigates a poison pen case.

episodes.name: The Moabite Cypher
episodes.overview: Dr Thorndyke has to decypher a code to stop a plot to assassinate a Russian Grand Duke.

episodes.name: The Secret of the Foxhunter
episodes.overview: William Drew of the foreign Office investigates an unusual crime.

episodes.name: The Missing Q.C's
episodes.overview: Charles Dallas is led into a strange and sinister adventure in the aftermath of a sensational murder trial.

episodes.name: The Looting of the Species Room
episodes.overview: Gold disappears from the strongroom of the RMS Oceanic and its purser, Mr Horrocks, tries to discover what has happened.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Amber Beads
episodes.overview: Hagar the Gypsy sets out to prove that Detective Sergeat Grubber is wrong about who killed Mrs Arryford.
